Dream Scenario (2023) - Movie Information and Download Links
---------------------------------------------------------------

### Title:
Dream Scenario

### Cast and crew:
* Director: Kristoffer Borgli
* Stars: Nicolas Cage, Julianne Nicholson, Michael Cera, Tim Meadows, Dylan Gelula, Dylan Baker, Jessica Clement, Star Slade, David Klein, Kaleb Horn, Liz Adjei, Paula Boudreau, Marnie McPhail, Noah Lamanna, Meaghan Rath, Jillian Bell, Mark McKinney, Lily Bird, Krista Bridges, Conrad Coates, Marnie Brunton, Nneka Elliott, Jeremy Levick, Lily Gao, Kate Berlant, Sofia Banzhaf, Jennifer Wigmore, Domenic Di Rosa, James Collins, Agape Mngomezulu, and others.
* Music: Owen Pallett
* Cinematography: Benjamin Loeb

### Genres:
Comedy

### Language:
English

### Release date:
September 9, 2023 (Toronto International Film Festival)
November 10, 2023 (USA)

### IMDb rating:
7.2/10 based on 5,809,792 user ratings

### Synopsis:
Professor Paul Matthews becomes famous overnight when he appears in everyone's dreams.

### Awards and nominations:
* Toronto International Film Festival – Platform Prize (nominated): Kristoffer Borgli
* Golden Globe Awards – Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy (nominated): Nicolas Cage
